talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hello. You seem to be new here.<sp:0:4:0>Do you intend to use that as a weapon
against the <clr:0000>Soldier Constructs<clr:ffff>?
talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You may practice <clr:0000>targeting<clr:ffff> on me if
you want.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>But please do not actually attack.
talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You may practice <clr:0000>targeting<clr:ffff> on me if
you want.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>But please do not actually attack.
talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:0000>Soldier Constructs<clr:ffff> are those of us given
strict orders to protect this land.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Zonai<clr:ffff> who created us directed them
to eliminate trespassers.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>They will consider you a trespasser.<sp:5:1:0> You
must treat them as a serious threat.<sp:0:4:0>Allow me to offer unsolicited advice.<sp:0:4:0>It is crucial to maintain a proper distance
and <clr:0000>target<clr:ffff> your opponents. Swinging
haphazardly will not yield results.
talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The Zonai who created us gave them
strict orders to protect this land.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>They will regard you as a trespasser if
they spot you. <sp:5:1:0>And their directive is to
eliminate all trespassers.<sp:0:4:0>You will have little choice in this scenario
but to fight them. <sp:5:0:0>It is better that you not
hold back on our account.<sp:0:4:0>I have a piece of advice if you do choose
to engage with them.<sp:0:4:0>It is crucial to maintain a proper distance
and <clr:0000>target<clr:ffff> your opponents. Swinging
haphazardly will not yield results.
talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You may practice <clr:0000>targeting<clr:ffff> on me if
you want.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>But please do not actually attack.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>Hello. You seem to be new here.<sp:0:4:0>Be wary of <clr:0000>Soldier Constructs <clr:ffff>as you
travel this way.
talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>Tread carefully around any <clr:0000>Soldier
Constructs<clr:ffff> you see. <sp:5:0:0>Our creators gave
them strict orders to protect this land.
talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>Be careful of our associates. Our creators<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
ordered the <clr:0000>Soldier Constructs <clr:ffff>to protect
this land. <sp:5:0:0>That makes them dangerous.
talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:0000>Soldier Constructs<clr:ffff> are those of us given
strict orders to protect this land.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Zonai<clr:ffff> who created us directed them
to eliminate trespassers.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>They will consider you a trespasser too.<sp:5:1:0>
You must treat them as a serious threat.<sp:0:4:0>Allow me to offer unsolicited advice.<sp:0:4:0>It is crucial to maintain a proper distance
and <clr:0000>target<clr:ffff> your opponents. Swinging
haphazardly will not yield results.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:0000>Soldier Constructs<clr:ffff> are those of us given
strict orders to protect this land.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>Zonai<clr:ffff> who created us directed them

talk_23:
There is a refresher on <clr:0000>targeting<clr:ffff> in the
<clr:0000>System<clr:ffff> section of the pause menu if
you forget.
talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Our creators gave them specific orders
to eliminate trespassers. <sp:5:0:0>Be careful
around them.<sp:0:4:0>My concern may be excessive. But I have
one piece of advice to offer you.<sp:0:4:0>It is crucial to maintain a proper distance
and <clr:0000>target<clr:ffff> your opponents. Swinging
haphazardly will not yield results.
talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>They will consider you a trespasser
in need of elimination. <sp:5:0:0>Be careful
around them.
